text: I bet you never thought you could have
your pie and drink it too well now you
can with this delicious pumpkin pie
milkshake it has all the spices of a
normal pumpkin pie plus a little bit of
orange juice and if you want a little
bit of bourbon so to start you squeeze
some fresh oranges this large reamer
does the trick really well to get all
the juice out of the orange it's about
one large orange one gave you a half a
cup of juice into the blender half a cup
of orange juice one cup of canned
pumpkin now this is just pure pumpkin
it's 100% canned pumpkin one cup then
one pint of vanilla ice cream whatever
is your favorite this is softened which
will help it puree perfectly now the
spices 1/4 teaspoon of ginger quarter
teaspoon of cinnamon these are the
typical spices found in a pumpkin pie so
don't really give it that pumpkin pie
flavor this is ground cloves you just
need a little bit a pinch is plenty very
strong blend this up
okay so this is great as it is and
perfect for kids but if you want to add
a little bit of something extra can add
some bourbon I love the addition of
bourbon in this it's really delicious
just a quarter cup
pour it in blend it up okay it's already
got a great glass here this will make a
couple so you'll have plenty to share
add a straw and now you get to drink
your pumpkin pie
you
